column4: Hey, is mail 'n stuff for Thunderbird stored in /home/use/.mozilla-thunderbird? (So, if I copy that folder, will t contain all my mail and settings?)
Ok, correct me if I'm wrong, but when the Ubuntu installer for Dapper says 'Unable to create a filesystem', that's -bad-.
Yeah, it was kind of a ironic comment...
What FS does Ubuntu use? Not Reiser, by any chance?
Meh, I'd hoped Dapper would use Reiser or other journalling FS
resie isn't exactly known as being stable (though it works stable for many people)
Was backing stuff up, forgot to unmount
or ipsec on top of your wlan
so, in consequence every VPN should be considered 'insecure'?
True to a lesser extent. A VPN can still be considered a 'secured environment' but is not secure as a localized network with controlled gateways
well, I'm not talking about 'absolute' security by any means :-)
I'm talking calculated risks- mind if we take this to a private query before we get kicked? =P
I won't mind stop talking about that... :)
I gave you a sort of overview of the arguments about why wireless is generally considered not secure
I don't feel like discussing about a 'serious' topic right now, sorry...
remember, ed is teh standard unix text editor! (-:
